hero_description: We connect global brands with their audience professionally. We hold exclusive agency rights for prestigious makeup products and aim to expand our portfolio with new agencies. We offer an intelligent distribution network, marketing expertise in the beauty sector, and unprecedented access to retail outlets. Make your products part of our success.

homepage.title: Your Strategic Partner in Distributing Luxury Cosmetics
homepage.description: Jumlat Al-Alwan   - Authorized distributor of premium beauty products. We hold exclusive agency rights for a prestigious makeup brand and aim to expand our portfolio with new agencies in the beauty and care sector.
homepage.description2: We provide a comprehensive distribution network covering major retail outlets, specialized marketing expertise, and an integrated logistics infrastructure to ensure your products reach the end consumer with quality and efficiency.

brand_category: High-quality products with a focus on lipsticks and mascaras

brands_section.title: Brands
brands_section.description: We are proud to represent leading brands in the world of beauty, and we always strive to expand our portfolio with new brands that share our vision for excellence

brand_card.description: Professional makeup products for every artist and enthusiast.
High-quality cosmetic products suitable for all tastes.

agencies_section.title: We are seeking new agencies
agencies_section.description: We aspire to expand our portfolio of premium brands in the cosmetics and skincare industry. If you represent a brand looking for a professional distribution partner in the Saudi and Gulf market, we welcome the opportunity to collaborate with you.
agencies_section.criteria_1: Product quality and excellence in its category
agencies_section.criteria_4: Brand alignment with our vision and values
agencies_section.criteria_5: Growth and expansion potential in the region
agencies_section.advantage_1: Extensive distribution network covering major stores and pharmacies
agencies_section.advantage_2: Dedicated marketing team specialized in the cosmetics sector
agencies_section.advantage_3: Integrated logistics management and modern warehouses
agencies_section.advantage_4: Market data analysis to improve performance

about_section.title: About Us
about_section.description: We are pioneers in the distribution of luxury cosmetics in Saudi Arabia, connecting premium global brands with regional markets.

mission_vision.title: Our Mission and Vision
mission_vision.paragraph1: Jumlah Alwan Foundation was established to be a strategic partner for global brands in the cosmetics sector. We started our journey by representing one agency and achieved widespread presence in the local market thanks to our strong distribution network.
mission_vision.paragraph2: Today, we seek to expand our portfolio of luxury commercial agencies to be the bridge connecting premium global brands with retailers in the region. We aspire to become the primary distribution hub for beauty products in the Middle East by 2028.

values.title: Strategic Partnership
values.description: We deal with brands as success partners, not just agencies

values.title: Distribution Efficiency
values.description: Logistics network covering all regions of the Kingdom with precise schedules

values.title: Mutual Growth
values.description: The success of brands is our primary measure of success

values.title: Continuous Innovation
values.description: We develop innovative distribution solutions that suit the variables of the cosmetics market

team.title: Our Specialized Team
team.description: Experts in the distribution and marketing of cosmetics
